sections.title: What do you plan to do with the gas?

fields.label: What do you plan to do with the gas?
What do 'send out', 'set aside' and 'supply' mean?
fields.infoText:
*Send out*

This is when you send out the gas from your premises for use as road fuel.

*Set aside*

This is when it is decided that the gas will be used as a road fuel. For example, when you label the container of the gas to show it will be used as road fuel.

*Supply*

This is when the gas is used as fuel for a road vehicle.

Where can I find out how to calculate the duty?
fields.infoText:
1. Open a new tab or window.
2. Go to GOV.UK.
3. Search for 'Excise Notice 76: excise duty on gas for use as fuel in road vehicles'.

fields.infoText:
By submitting this registration you confirm that the information you have provided is true and complete. 

If you do not give complete and accurate information, HMRC may charge a financial penalty or even prosecute you.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted registration.

To complete this registration you must also use form C&E930B to provide us with more details about your premises. You can access this from the guidance page for this service on GOV.UK.

If the business you are registering is a partnership, you’ll also need to email: enquiries.eeitts@hmrc.gov.uk to tell us so that we can ask you for more details about the partnership.
